pages.text: Turkeys are large birds that can be found in Maple Forest.$(br2)You can bred them using Foul Berries.$(br2)On death, they may drop Feathers and Raw Turkey.$(br2)You can place the Raw turkey on the ground like a Pie. You can cook it into Cooked Turkey and place on the ground as well.
You can use it to craft Raw Turkey Piece, and you can cook that pieces too.
